author: grahamd
msg: Don't have new importer look by default in handler root directory unless
file the import is being done from is in that directory. Looking in the
handler root directory can be enabled if needed for backward compatibility.
When enabled, PythonPath being set does not prevent the lookup occuring.

author: mloenko
msg: making regression tests integrated with HARMONY-387 fix compliant to the conventions
making other tests in the modified files compliant to the conventions

author: dblevins
msg: Fix for GBUILD-16 "Improve GBuild agent JMS reconnect logic"
1. Use ActiveMQ failover with exponential delay maxed at 30min
2. Retry every two hours there after up to four days

author: dblevins
msg: Replaced the StringTemplate impl with the one from codehaus.
